description: This file defines various entity classes for a social media management platform's persistence layer, including entities for users, social accounts, posts, analytics, and automation rules.

classes.name: SocialProvider
classes.description: Enumeration of supported social media providers.

classes.name: User
classes.description: Represents a user in the system with associated social accounts and automation rules.

classes.name: SocialAccount
classes.description: Represents a social media account linked to a user, including provider info and tokens.

classes.name: ScheduledPost
classes.description: Represents a post scheduled for future publication on social media.

classes.name: PublishedPost
classes.description: Represents a post that has been published, including engagement metrics.

classes.name: AnalyticsSnapshot
classes.description: Captures analytics data for a social account at a specific point in time.

classes.name: AutomationRule
classes.description: Defines automation rules for user actions based on triggers and conditions.
